ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend Sociology 660 to another student. The literature covered is fantastic and the class discussions are even better. Soc 660 approaches the material from an interdisciplinary point of view and offers an opportunity for students from many different departments to learn a tremendous amount the "black community" in the United States.

A great class which would help prepare you for an Orals field in Black urban studies. The wealth of texts provide a really great glimpse of urban spaces in the late 19th and 20th centuries. Extremely wide spread of soc. (and some econ) readings that helps de-ossify what people think soc is, in the humanities.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It broadened my interest in doing/incorporating Sociological research into my dissertation and is helping drive an ethnographic study.
